episodes.title: Government Analyst Who Helped in Exhumation of Bodies in Shakahola Testifies
episodes.description: Government Analyst David Mumbao, who played a key role in the Shakahola massacre investigations, testified in court today on the procedures followed during the exhumation of over 400 bodies from shallow graves linked to cult leader Paul Mackenzie. Mumbao detailed the forensic methods used and the condition of the remains recovered from the forest in Kilifi County.

episodes.title: Malindi Children officer Sebastian Muteti testifies in Pastor Paul Mackenzie Shakahola case
episodes.description: Sebastian Muteti’s testimony painted a harrowing picture of systematic child abuse carried out under Pastor Mackenzie’s Shakahola cult. His accounts of starvation, torture, and radical indoctrination among minors deepen the weight of the charges as the trial continues, highlighting the role of civil protection agencies amid a complex criminal investigation.
